li.div: El gobernador Polis ha anunciado que extenderá la suspensión del aprendizaje normal en persona en todas las escuelas primarias y secundarias públicas y hasta entonces fin de curso. GCSD 16 anticipó esto y continuamos trabajando diligentemente para proporcionar servicios de educación a distancia y nutrición a nuestros estudiantes. Este nuevo formato está ampliando nuestras capacidades y probando nuestras habilidades. No ha estado exento de fracasos, pero nuestra determinación es real y nuestro deseo de ayudar a nuestros estudiantes y familias a prosperar en este momento difícil es cierto. La dedicación de los empleados de GCSD 16, nuestros estudiantes, nuestros padres y nuestra comunidad han sido maravillosos .

Gov. Polis has announced that he is extending the suspension of normal in-person learning at all public and private elementary and secondary schools until then end of the academic year. GCSD 16 anticipated this and we continue to work diligently to provide distance learning and nutrition services to our students. This new format is stretching our capacities and testing our skills. It has not been without its failures, but our resolve is real and our desire to help our students and families thrive through this difficult time is true. The dedication of the GCSD 16 employees, our students, our parents, and our community have been wonderful.

address.aria-label: Address for Garfield County School District 16
Phone number for Garfield County School District 16
Fax number for Garfield County School District 16

span.data-emptytext: Garfield County School District 16 provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value:
In compliance with Title VI & VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, Title IX of the Education Amendment of 1972; Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967, the Americans with Disabilities Act, the Genetic Information Nondiscrimination Act of 2008, and Colorado law, Garfield County School District 16 does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, sex, religion, national origin, ancestry, creed, age, marital status, sexual orientation, genetic information, disability or need for special education services in admissions, access to, treatment, or employment in educational programs or activities which it operates. English speaking ability will not be a barrier to participation and admission to District programs. Complaint procedures have been established for students, parents, employees and community members. The following person(s) have been identified as the compliance officer for the District. Todd Ellis, Assistant Superintendent Garfield County SD 16, 0460 Stone Quarry Road, Parachute, CO 61635.970-285-5701. tellis@garfield16.org Office for Civil Rights U.S. Department of Education Cesar E. Chavez Memorial Building 1244 Speer Boulevard, Suite 310 Denver, CO 80204-3582 Telephone: 303-844-5695. OCR.Denver@ed.gov
En cumplimiento del Título VI y VII del Acto de Derechos Civiles de 1964, Título IX de la Enmienda de Educación de 1972; Sección 504 del Acto de la Rehabilitación de 1973, la Discriminación de Edad en Acto del Empleo de 1967, el Acto de los Americanos con Discapacidades, el Acto de no Discriminación de Información Genética de 2008 y la ley de Colorado, Condadode Garfield Distrito Escolars 16 no discrimina ilegalmente en base a raza, color, sexo, religión, origen nacional, ascendencia, credo, edad, estado civil, orientación sexual, información genética, discapacidad o necesidad de servicios de educación especial en la admisión, acceso, tratamiento o empleo en programas educativos o actividades que opera. Capacidad de hablar ingles no será un obstáculo para la participación y admisión a programas del Distrito. Se han establecido procedimientos de queja para los estudiantes, padres, empleados, y los miembros de la comunidad. La(s) siguiente(s) persona(s) han sido identificadas como el oficial de cumplimiento para el Distrito. Todd Ellis, Asistente de Superintendente Garfield County SD 16, 0460 Stone Quarry Road, Parachute, CO 61635.970-285-5701. tellis@garfield16.org Office for Civil Rights U.S. Department of Education Cesar E. Chavez Memorial Building 1244 Speer Boulevard, Suite 310 Denver, CO 80204-3582 Telephone: 303-844-5695. OCR.Denver@ed.gov

p.span:
In compliance with Title VI & VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, Title IX of the Education Amendment of 1972; Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967, the Americans with Disabilities Act, the Genetic Information Nondiscrimination Act of 2008, and Colorado law, Garfield County School District 16 does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, sex, religion, national origin, ancestry, creed, age, marital status, sexual orientation, genetic information, disability or need for special education services in admissions, access to, treatment, or employment in educational programs or activities which it operates. English speaking ability will not be a barrier to participation and admission to District programs. Complaint procedures have been established for students, parents, employees and community members. The following person(s) have been identified as the compliance officer for the District. Todd Ellis, Assistant Superintendent Garfield County SD 16, 0460 Stone Quarry Road, Parachute, CO 61635.970-285-5701. tellis@garfield16.org Office for Civil Rights U.S. Department of Education Cesar E. Chavez Memorial Building 1244 Speer Boulevard, Suite 310 Denver, CO 80204-3582 Telephone: 303-844-5695. OCR.Denver@ed.gov
En cumplimiento del Título VI y VII del Acto de Derechos Civiles de 1964, Título IX de la Enmienda de Educación de 1972; Sección 504 del Acto de la Rehabilitación de 1973, la Discriminación de Edad en Acto del Empleo de 1967, el Acto de los Americanos con Discapacidades, el Acto de no Discriminación de Información Genética de 2008 y la ley de Colorado, Condadode Garfield Distrito Escolars 16 no discrimina ilegalmente en base a raza, color, sexo, religión, origen nacional, ascendencia, credo, edad, estado civil, orientación sexual, información genética, discapacidad o necesidad de servicios de educación especial en la admisión, acceso, tratamiento o empleo en programas educativos o actividades que opera. Capacidad de hablar ingles no será un obstáculo para la participación y admisión a programas del Distrito. Se han establecido procedimientos de queja para los estudiantes, padres, empleados, y los miembros de la comunidad. La(s) siguiente(s) persona(s) han sido identificadas como el oficial de cumplimiento para el Distrito. Todd Ellis, Asistente de Superintendente Garfield County SD 16, 0460 Stone Quarry Road, Parachute, CO 61635.970-285-5701. tellis@garfield16.org Office for Civil Rights U.S. Department of Education Cesar E. Chavez Memorial Building 1244 Speer Boulevard, Suite 310 Denver, CO 80204-3582 Telephone: 303-844-5695. OCR.Denver@ed.gov

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.

button.class: btn btn-default
btn sb-organization-color-element-bg

div.p: As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
